name: Off Color
description: Off-Color is an RPG pixelated story game that takes place in the world “Palette”. The player and their fellow characters work to adventure through multiple color realms  in the Cool and Warm worlds, fighting enemies as well as bosses and gaining memory fragments to piece together why the separation of their original worlds existed in the first place. The player must work to fight through various levels of the Warm and Cool worlds past the Monochrome wall, the only thing keeping the color worlds from the Grey worlds. It is up to the player and his band  of companions to unravel the mystery of the Monochrome wall and establish peace in the Warm, Cool, and Grey worlds.
